metadata.title: Gaia Network Predefined Scenarios
metadata.description: Predefined scenarios for the Gaia Network demonstration

scenarios.name: Financial Viability of Coastal Properties
scenarios.description: Evaluates how sea level rise affects long-term property values and insurance costs in Miami.
scenarios.highlight: Shows that without adaptation measures, coastal property values decline by 35% over 30 years.

scenarios.name: Climate Resilience Investment
scenarios.description: Models the ROI of climate adaptation infrastructure across coastal communities.
scenarios.highlight: Demonstrates how high adaptation investments maintain property values despite increasing climate risks.

scenarios.name: High-Emissions Investment Assessment
scenarios.description: Evaluates financial impacts under a high-emissions scenario with minimal adaptation.
scenarios.highlight: Projects severe financial losses and insurance unavailability in high-risk coastal zones.

scenario_categories.name: Financial Impact Scenarios
scenario_categories.description: Scenarios focusing on financial impacts and ROI

scenario_categories.name: Climate Mitigation Scenarios
scenario_categories.description: Scenarios with different levels of emissions mitigation
